Dayda

City of New York

This is a catalog of datasets organized and made more accessible from the City of New York, providing simple dowloadable CSV and JSON files, as well as Postman Collections you can use as part of workflows and other automation.

    NYC Parks Ice Skating Rinks

    NYC Parks Drinking Fountains

    Each record is either an individual drinking fountain or multiple drinking fountains that are attached to each other. NYC Parks created the dataset using collector for arcgis. All outdoor drinking ...

    NYC Parks Dog Runs

    Dog runs are large, fenced-in areas for dogs to exercise unleashed during park hours. Each record in this dataset is an individual dog run. Planimetrics have ensured good GIS quality of the data. ...

    NYC Parks Daily Tasks Cleaning Routes, Fiscal Year 2016

    This data contains a snapshot of the routes used by NYC Parks’ mobile cleaning crews, and is accurate as of June 15, 2017. This data directly relates to https://data.cityofnewyork.us/Environment/NY...

    NYC Independent Budget Office (IBO) Tax Revenue FY 1980 - FY 2014

    Annual tax revenue from major tax sources, from FY 1980 - FY 2014.

    NYC Independent Budget Office (IBO) State And Federal Categorical Aid, FY 1980 - 2013

    Annual state and federal categorical aid by purpose of grant, from FY 1980 through FY 2013

    NYC Independent Budget Office (IBO) Revenue And Spending Summary FY 1980 - FY 2013

    Annual revenue and spending data by major areas of the budget from FY 1980 through FY 1963

    NYC Independent Budget Office (IBO) Non- Tax Revenues FY 1980 - FY 2013

    Annual non-tax revenue from major revenue sources, from FY 1980 through FY 2013
